PMU-24203,CVP,Command to see object history,1-Blocker - SEV1,ER014129,Release 6.2,N,Draft,Obsolete,N,FVG,The history component or jsp page used by BPS makes a call to Kernel to retreive the history information on the given object . A customisation or separate developement is recommended for providing history on an object to a webtop client. Currently  BPS components are made to be used with ENOVIA web apps. BPS has also made a limited number of widgets for the 3DDashboard. It make make sense in the future to provide APIs and corresponding widgets and-or X-apps for use with other apps on the 3DDashboard. At this time  this is not affordable for BPS due to resource constraints and an already filled schedule for all current releases -DECOSTOMISATION,Michelin - BB
